review_data.title: Nice neighborhood cafe with welcoming staff
review_data.content: A lovely hostess, a fresh and hot hot chocolate, comfortable padded inside seating and spacious sidewalk seating with awning at the corner platz. I enjoyed my early morning hot chocolate (lactose free or soya option) 5.80CHF, and relaxed with the lazy start to the morning....More

review_data.title: Nettes Café mit leckeren Kuchen,
review_data.content: Nettes Café mit leckeren Kuchen, Frühstück und kleinen Speisen, sowie Mittagessen. Sitzplätze draussen. Für mich der beste Cappuccino in Zürich...More

review_data.title: Mittagessen vom feinsten
review_data.content: Sehr freundliches Personal, sehr gute Location. Sehr gutes Essen, sehr feine Kaffe und dazu natürlich ein stück Kuchen.

review_data.title: Breakfast at Ferdinand’s
review_data.content: We came by coincidence and for breakfast to this nice restaurant and café close to the Goldbrunnenplatz in Zurich. Service was okay, but not overly friendly. Breakfast tasted great and typically Swiss with coffees, orange juice and Gipfeli. Is this a helpful review? Then please...More

review_data.title: Angenehmes Ambiente an guter Lage
review_data.content: Wir besuchen dieses Café immer mal wieder und geniessen den guten und freundlichen Service. Die Lage ist sehr zentral und...More

review_data.title: Super Brunch
review_data.content: A mi hija le encanta ir. El desayuno es magnífico. Servicio muy atento y agradable. Riquísimo el chocolate caliente.

review_data.title: Home Made
review_data.content: Alles ist "Home Made", sehr einfaches aber warmes Türkisches Lokal mit sehr feinem Türkisches essen. Ich kann es nur empfehlen....More

review_data.title: Terrible service
review_data.content: Do not go to this place if you are not willing to wait for at least an hour after ordering. I've been there twice on not at all crowded evenings and in both tomes waited an hour after ordering.

review_data.title: Awesome Turkish food
review_data.content: One of the most awesomest Turkish food I've had in Switzerland... Just ask for meze and rakı, and enjoy....

review_data.title: ÇÖLDE VAHA
review_data.content: Vedat Abi önderliğinde dost meclisi bir mekan. Burayı basitçe Türk Restaurantı diye anlatamazsınız. 10 numara 5 yıldız. Harika yemekleri, yüreği...More

review_data.title: nice homemade food
review_data.content: They usually offer three dishes a day plus standards from the menu. It is a normal cafe till approx 5 pm (except Sundays) and the becomes a restaurant with mainly Turkish cuisine. On Sundays there is a very nice breakfast but unfortunately only from 1pm...More

review_data.title: Unique Turkish Menu
review_data.content: We went here for dinner after introduced to this restaurant by a couple of friends. What we like about this cafe is the fact that it is never over crowded, so we normally get seats without problem. We can relax, chill out, while eating calmly...More

review_data.title: Home made turkish food
review_data.content: If you never tried home made Turkish food , this place is the only address in Zurich. Manti is strongly recommended.
